text: Sure, can you please explain in details

Hi, We're building websites for customers and I was wondering if there is a way to registeren in the CRM what websites we have developed for a specific customer. Is the CRM suitable for something like that? I would probably need a one-to-many relation but is that even possible ?

Hello,

Is there any way to download all attachments inside a deal at once?
In some deals we have 15+ attachments, and it is a big pain to go and download 1 by 1 across multiple deals.

Thanks
I am try <https://prnt.sc/1KOezxq0wKsj> this api code but get this <https://prnt.sc/H_-r-_34JLwH> error.

Hi!
I'm working on the custom module for blog article template
I'm making an optional subheading for posts. When I'm trying to update the custom "Article Subheading" field - some fields are dissappears like article title and tags. The content of this fields appears only page reloading
This is screenshot when I filled the field content and reload the page: <https://prnt.sc/1ULy_tWCjmjN>
And here the screenshot before page reloading, but after updating the custom field: <https://prnt.sc/KMIyCEmGbfla>
Why is this happening? How can I make fields be visible without reloading?

Looks like blog content object become unavailable or clears after editing the fields
Totally open - feel free to reach out anytime :slightly_smiling_face:

Today HubSpot added an Overview tab to ticket pages on my account, which is shown by default instead of the Activity tab. Does anyone know how to disable it? My teams' workflow needs to see the activity tab to check the current status of a ticket (notes and state changes), not anything on the Overview tab.
Hello Guys,

I am getting the following error while accessing contacts and tickets from postman: `This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.`
This message was deleted.
Please help me
Delete this
You're trying to use a API in the place of a private app token
I'm going to delete this <@U04F1E85MEW>
It was a major security risk. Sorry about that!
Thanks <@UQNEXHW14>
Check out these docs <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/private-apps>
Hey folks - please don't make multiple posts for the same topic, and please keep topics threaded.
Does Facebook’s CAPI implementation work with HubSpot Deals?

Hi all, I have an API question! Is it possible to surface the connected application’s name and ID in the HubSpot API response? Is there a metadata endpoint we can use, or somewhere in the response bodies we can look?
cc <@U04EN8S3GAK>

A while back, someone linked to a CMS documentation page for a tag or variable that was along the lines of `is_in_editor` — specifically with regards to creating placeholders/default content for modules when viewed in the dnd builder.

I’ve run into a situation where it’d be very handy, but I can’t seem to find the page in the documentation _or_ the post which referenced it. Anyone know where I could find that?

This was the post
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1668431939578099>
Here you can find the source it's referencing
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#editor-placeholders>
Yes, thank you!
